title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the new image is not displayed. Instead, the original image remains on the screen.
OB: No image change occurs after importing a new image.
EB: After importing a new image, the expected behavior is that the new image is displayed on the screen.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the layout. 
2. Import a new image, for example, 'image1.jpg'. 
3. Observe the screen and verify that the new image is correctly displayed. 
4. Import the same image 'image1.jpg' again. 
5. Notice that the original image remains displayed instead of the newly imported one.
